text:

• Discussion on flow, find fixes needed, find gaps, take new requirements for HR
Next

Next

Nov 10
• Go through Odoo checklist with Visakh, Aravind, Bodhi and get timelines
• Few other discussions regarding odoo and other bugs
• Made odoo endpoints transactional instead of signals
• Trying to get Odoo sudeendhra DO test instance up
Next -
• Get instance up and test

Nov 11
• Configure Odoo sudeendhra DO test instance and test
• Discussion with Visakh on bugs faced, Aravind regarding odoo stuff
• Other huddles with team
Next -
• Product Commission module not showing up in SSMM - check

Nov 12
• Fix commission module load in ssmm, which fixed user create
• Add multi discount edit support in Invoice Edit PR
• Few calls & discussions
• PR reviews
Next -
• Follow up on SSMM instance config
• Modify Odoo User create - type based on role
• Odoo Mail server
